de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler.simple

Class DefaultImcHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.hsbremen.tc.tnc.tnccs.message.handler.simple.DefaultImcHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ImcHandler, TnccsMessageHandler

    public class DefaultImcHandler
extends Object
implements ImcHandler
    Default IMC handler to handle messages destined to/from an IMC.

      Creates an IMC handler with the given IMC adapter manager to manage the IMC and the given connection factory to create IMC connections for every IMC with the given IMC connection context.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DefaultImcHandler

        public DefaultImcHandler(ImAdapterManager<ImcAdapter> manager,
                 ImcConnectionAdapterFactory connectionFactory,
                 ImcConnectionContext connectionContext,
                 ImMessageRouter router)
        Creates an IMC handler with the given IMC adapter manager to manage the IMC and the given connection factory to create IMC connections for every IMC with the given IMC connection context. The message router is used to route the message based on its component type address to IMC, that are interested in that type.
        Parameters:
        manager - the IMC manager
        connectionFactory - the IMC connection factory
        connectionContext - the IMC connection context
        router - the message router

        public List<TnccsMessage> lastCall()
        Description copied from interface: TnccsMessageHandler
